protein.specific_function: Hydrolysis of the deoxyribose N-glycosidic bond to excise 3-methyladenine, and 7-methylguanine from the damaged DNA polymer formed by alkylation lesions

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on glycosyl bonds
